snippet: A court ordered Pervez Musharraf detained after approving an application from a cleric who wanted Mr. Musharraf tried for his role in the deadly siege of the Red Mosque in Islamabad in 2007.
abstract: Pakistani court orders nation's former military ruler Pervez Musharraf detained after approving application from cleric who wants him tried for his role in deadly siege of the Red Mosque in Islamabad in 2007; it is unclear whether court order poses major obstacle to Musharraf's plans to leave Pakistan, or temporary setback.
lead_paragraph: A court ordered Pervez Musharraf detained after approving an application from a cleric who wanted Mr. Musharraf tried for his role in the deadly siege of the Red Mosque in Islamabad in 2007.

headline.main: In New Case, Former Leader of Pakistan Is Arrested
headline.print_headline: In New Case, Former Leader Of Pakistan Is Arrested
